A 20 foot demon made fully of stone is here. He brings fear into
your heart, pain into your soul. This tough beast seems unstoppable.
18047.room_name: An evil demon of stone is here.
18047.name: a demon of stone~

description: Tall and strong, this Royal Titan guard patrols the castle walls.
18048.room_name: A Royal Titan guard is here.
18048.name: a Royal Titan guard~

description: This little boy is amusing himself witha few rocks.
18049.room_name: A small titan boy is here, playing with some rocks.
18049.name: a small titan boy~

description:
She seems to be enjoying playing outside with her little doll. She is a very 
pretty little girl, all dressed in pink. She looks like some of the other 
children at the park. Perhaps all titan children look the same.
18050.room_name: A small titan girl is here, playing with her doll.
18050.name: a titan girl~

description:
Zzzzzzz....Zzzzzzzz.....Zzzzzzzzz....
*SSSSSHHHHHhhhhhhhhh.......!* He is sleeping and you'd hate to disturb him!
18051.room_name: A patrol guard is sleeping here.
18051.name: a sleeping patrol guard~

description:
She seems to be in deep conversation with the queen, it would be
foolish to disturb her.
18052.room_name: The first advisor is here, offering her help.
18052.name: the first advisor~

description:
He is a very clean man, with deep black eyes, the build of a warrior and the 
face of a mage. He seems to be selling the best battle animals in the world. 
Perhaps he could interest you in some of his beasts?
18053.room_name: The Keeper of the Deadly Beasts is here, selling is animals!
18053.name: the keeper of the deadly beasts~

description: Very large and very deadly, you would NOT want to mess with this black cougar!
18054.room_name: A black cougar is here, protecting its master.
18054.name: the Visious Black Cougar~

description:
VERY very big and tough, this kraken looks to be the most fearsome thing you 
have ever seen!
18055.room_name: A very deadly Kraken is here protecting its owner.
18055.name: the Deadly Kraken~

description:
A small but beautiful creature, this sylph seems to be a weak fighter. Despite 
her size, she is one of the most rare and deadly creatures in all of Thera.
18056.room_name: A Magical Sylph is here, aiding her master in battle.
18056.name: the Magical Sylph~

description:
A small but cute little spider monkey is here, aiding its master
in their times of need.
18057.room_name: A cute spider monkey is here, resting on its masters' shoulder.
18057.name: a Spider Monkey~

description:
A cute little male lion is here, following his master about,
always ready for combat.
18058.room_name: A tame lion is here, following his master about.
18058.name: a tame lion~

description: A fearsome black wolf is here, protecting his master.
18059.room_name: A large black wolf is here, guarding his master.
18059.name: a large black wolf~

description:
A large and deadly Java Beast is here, protecting her master with
its magical flames.
18060.room_name: A fearsome Java Beast is here, protecting her master.
18060.name: a Fearsome Java Beast~
subroutines:
F aff J
F res B

description: A tall and proud king is here, planning the future of his kingdom.
18061.room_name: The King Dractax of The Titans is here.
18061.name: the King Dractax~

description: A tall and proud queen is here, planning the future of her kingdom.
18062.room_name: The Queen Crystal of The Titans is here.
18062.name: the Queen Crystal~

description:
All clad in black, you find this stealthy assassin hiding in the secret 
passage-way behind the throne. Obviously, someone in the kingdom wants the 
king and queen destroyed. Why is beyond all knowledge.
18063.room_name: An assassin is here, stalking the king and queen.
18063.name: an assassin~

description: An ugly rat is here, chewing on the carpet.
18064.room_name: An ugly small rat is here.
18064.name: a small rat~

description:
She seems to be quite busy, yet manages to have the time to enjoy
the calm breeze and bright warm sunshine.
18065.room_name: A happy peasant is here, enjoying the sunny day.
18065.name: a happy peasant~

description: An old man peering through ancient tomes rests here.
18066.room_name: The ranger and druid guildmaster stands here.
18066.name: the guildmaster~

description: An young man wrapped in purple, long-flowing robes meditates here.
18067.room_name: A cleric guildstudent stands here, learning his skills.
18067.name: the guildstudent~

description:
A smaller man dressed in nothing but a tunic stands here waiting
to fight mighty foes.
18068.room_name: A warrior guildstudent stands here, learning the art of combat.
18068.name: the guildstudent~

description:
A small elf dressed in black rests in the corner. As you enter he grabs 
a knife an throws it at you. It lands the wall next to your left ear. 
"We will now begin," is all he says.
18069.room_name: The vampire and mage guildmaster stands here.
18069.name: the guildmaster~

description: This man looks like a mage/warrior, i wouldn't mess with him.
18070.room_name: The Guard for the Guild of Mages stand here.
18070.name: the guildguard~

description: This man looks like a master druid. I wouldn't mess with him.
18071.room_name: The Guard for the Guild of Druids stands here.
18071.name: the guildguard~

description: The man looks like Apollo's cousin, I wouldn't mess with him.
18072.room_name: The Guard for the Guild of Rangers stands here.
18072.name: the guildguard~

description:
You see a vampire dressed all in black, he quickly stands as you enter and 
steps to bar your way. You notice his hands resting on two sheafs.
18073.room_name: The Guard for the Guild of Vampires stands here.
18073.name: the guildguard~

description: You see a small boy running around the halls of the palace.
18074.room_name: A servant boy is here running errands.
18074.name: a servant boy~

description:
You see a small round dwarven man, gazing at all the sites. He's looking at 
a small tavelling map that he seems to be holding upside down.
18075.room_name: A tourist stands here looking lost.
18075.name: a tourist~

description:
A common possition for teenaged titans in this village. You'll be
seeing several store aid's in stores allover the village!
18076.room_name: The store helper is here, aiding the shopkeeper.
18076.name: the store aid~
subroutines:
M speech 18002 ready~
M give 18004 1349~
M speech 18001 ingredients~
M greet 18000 50~

description:
A beautiful young women is here, sewing leather together to make the newest 
clothes around. She seems quite busy and you would hate to bug her.
18077.room_name: The leather worker is here, working on some new clothes.
18077.name: the leather worker~

description:
He is all hot and sweaty from working over the great fires. He is
forging many new weapons to sell in his store.
18078.room_name: A hard working blacksmith is here, creating new swords.
18078.name: a hard working blacksmith~

description:
He is a strong looking man, working hard at the defense of the city. He seems 
to be creating a defense plan, if the city is ever attacked. You better not 
disturb him.
18079.room_name: The Lieutenant Commander of the Titan Army is here.
18079.name: the Titan Lieutenant Commander~

description:
He is a strong looking man, working hard at making his sword sharp for combat. 
He seems to just be waiting around for his next order.
18080.room_name: A Soldier of The Titan Army is here, sharpening his swords.
18080.name: a Titan Soldier~

description:
He is busy working on putting together he newest steal to his
finest armor. Perhaps he has something in your size.
18087.room_name: A hard working armourer is here, creating new armor.
18087.name: Kekule~
subroutines:
M speech 18011 give it back please~
M give 18010 52202~
M give 18009 8193~
M speech 18008 illustrium~
M speech 18007 mistian crown~
M speech 18006 overlay~
M speech 18005 hea~
M speech 18014 make the belt~
M speech 18014 make the sash~
M speech 18015 crimson sash~
M grall 18016 50~

description: A large deadly Hydra is here and will do anything to protect her master.
18090.room_name: A large and deadly Hydra is here.
18090.name: the Deadly Hydra~

description:
The court aritist is here, giving his bit of advice to the queen. You wouldn't 
want toget on this guys bad side, for he can draw a spell on you and your 
friends!
18097.room_name: The court aritist is here, consulting with the Queen.
18097.name: the court aritist~

description:
Standing tall behind her desk, she offers her help. You notice a huge selection
in potions and pills, you wonder which you shall buy. You know right away that 
any type of cure you would need, here is where you'd get it.
18098.room_name: The fine young apothecary is here, selling her potions.
18098.name: the apothecary~

description:
You see a well dressed villager walking by, singing in tune with the beat 
of the bongo drums. He has many items in his hands; proof of his shopping. 
You are glad that this town is such a happy place... lets just hope it doesn't 
get too happy.
18099.room_name: A happy villager is here, enjoying the festivals!
18099.name: a happy villager~

description:
You look at a very large, and very strong man.  He wears a suit made out
of brown iron, very strong.  In his hand, he holds a sword, glowing with
magic.  He is a Magtik Warrior of The Empire Of Vector Army.
18126.room_name: A large warrior stands in a suit of iron. He scans the area.
18126.name: A Magtik Army Warrior~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK

description:
Draomar is an older titan with a holy gleam to his eyes.  He stands
in his forge tending the fires untill inspiration strikes.  His hands
